version_description:
• Added a new game (Replay)
• Minor improvements

• Added a new game (Replay)
• Fixed an issue that may cause sound effects to be played very loud
• Minor improvements

• Added a new game: Indiana GP!
• Added support for watchOS 4 and Apple Watch Series 0
• Improved PongPong AI
• Minor bug fixes

• Added a new game: Slimenator!
• Critical bug fix on iOS 11 and watchOS 4

• Added a new game: Slimenator!
• Added color blind mode
• Minor tweaks
• Bugs fix

• Added a new game: Tap-A-Mole!
• Leaderboards are finally available on Apple Watch!
• Added "Today", "Week" and "All time" leaderboards.
• Added new tab-based leaderboards interface.

• Added a new game: Tap-A-Mole!
• Improved graphics quality on Apple Watch 40 mm.
• Leaderboards are finally available on Apple Watch!
• Added "Today", "Week" and "All time" leaderboards.

• Added a new game: CandyBall!
• Updated for watchOS 7, iOS 14 and iPadOS 14!
• Temporarily removed leaderboards window on Apple Watch due to issues with watchOS 7
• Bug fixes

• Added a new game: FastRun!
• Added manual mode in Bubble Mania (Apple Watch)
• Improved loading times
